sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Home, Search, User, Bell, Filter, MapPin, Clock, Users, Star, BookOpen, TrendingUp, Award, Target, MessageCircle, Calendar, ChevronRight, Play, CheckCircle, Heart, Bookmark, Share2, Eye, Zap, Flame, // <-- use Flame instead of Fire Gift } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = ({ userProfile, onNavigate }) => { // REACT STATE - Multiple pieces of state for different dashboard sections const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('home'); // Track which tab is active const [selectedFilter, setSelectedFilter] = useState('recommended'); // Filter internships const [bookmarkedInternships, setBookmarkedInternships] = useState([]); // Save favorites const [notifications, setNotifications] = useState(3); // Unread notifications const [userStats, setUserStats] = useState({ xp: 150, level: 2, streak: 5, completedQuests: 3 }); // MOCK DATA - In a real app, this would come from an API const mockInternships = [ { id: 1, title: 'Digital India Assistant', organization: 'Ministry of Electronics & IT', location: userProfile?.location || 'Delhi', duration: '3 months', stipend: '₹10,000/month', skills: ['Digital Literacy', 'Communication', 'Computer Basics'], matchPercentage: 95, type: 'Government', deadline: '15 days left', applicants: 234, isNew: true, description: 'Support digital literacy programs in rural areas' }, { id: 2, title: 'Rural Development Trainee', organization: 'Ministry of Rural Development', location: userProfile?.location || 'Mumbai', duration: '6 months', stipend: '₹12,000/month', skills: ['Leadership', 'Communication', 'Social Work'], matchPercentage: 88, type: 'Government', deadline: '8 days left', applicants: 156, isNew: false, description: 'Work on village development projects and community engagement' }, { id: 3, title: 'Healthcare Data Analyst', organization: 'Ministry of Health', location: userProfile?.location || 'Bangalore', duration: '4 months', stipend: '₹15,000/month', skills: ['Data Analysis', 'Computer Skills', 'Healthcare'], matchPercentage: 82, type: 'Government', deadline: '12 days left', applicants: 89, isNew: true, description: 'Analyze healthcare data to improve public health outcomes' } ]; const mockMentors = [ { id: 1, name: 'Dr. Priya Sharma', role: 'Senior Policy Advisor', organization: 'NITI Aayog', expertise: ['Government Policy', 'Rural Development'], rating: 4.9, sessions: 127, image: '👩‍💼', isAvailable: true }, { id: 2, name: 'Rahul Gupta', role: 'Tech Lead', organization: 'Digital India', expertise: ['Technology', 'Digital Transformation'], rating: 4.8, sessions: 95, image: '👨‍💻', isAvailable: false } ]; // REACT EFFECT - Runs when component mounts (similar to page load) useEffect(() => { // Simulate loading user progress and recommendations console.log('Dashboard loaded for user:', userProfile?.name); // In a real app, you'd fetch data here: // fetchUserRecommendations(userProfile.id); // fetchUserProgress(userProfile.id); }, [userProfile]); // Re-run if userProfile changes // EVENT HANDLERS - Functions that respond to user actions const toggleBookmark = (internshipId) => { setBookmarkedInternships(prev => prev.includes(internshipId) ? prev.filter(id => id !== internshipId) : [...prev, internshipId] ); }; const handleApply = (internship) => { console.log('Applying to:', internship.title); alert(`🎯 Application started for ${internship.title}!\n\nNext: Complete application form and upload documents.`); }; const handleMentorConnect = (mentor) => { console.log('Connecting to mentor:', mentor.name); alert(`💬 Connecting you with ${mentor.name}!\n\nYou'll receive a chat invitation shortly.`); }; // UTILITY FUNCTIONS const getSkillColor = (skill) => { const colors = { 'Digital Literacy': 'bg-blue-500', 'Communication': 'bg-green-500', 'Computer Basics': 'bg-purple-500', 'Leadership': 'bg-yellow-500', 'Social Work': 'bg-pink-500', 'Data Analysis': 'bg-cyan-500', 'Healthcare': 'bg-red-500' }; return colors[skill] || 'bg-gray-500'; }; const getLevelProgress = () => { const currentLevelXP = userStats.xp % 100; return (currentLevelXP / 100) * 100; }; // TAB CONTENT RENDERERS - Each tab shows different content const renderHomeTab = () => (
{/* Welcome Header with User Stats */}

Welcome back, {userProfile?.name}! 👋

Ready to continue your journey?

{userStats.xp} XP
Level {userStats.level}
{/* XP Progress Bar */}
Level Progress {Math.floor(getLevelProgress())}%
{/* Quick Stats */}
{userStats.streak}
Day Streak 🔥
{userStats.completedQuests}
Quests Done ✅
{bookmarkedInternships.length}
Bookmarked 📚
{/* Continue Your Journey Section */}

Continue Your Journey

Complete Profile Setup

Add portfolio and preferences

Skill Assessment Quiz

Test your current abilities

{/* Top Recommendations Preview */}

Top Matches for You

{mockInternships.slice(0, 2).map((internship) => (

{internship.title}

{internship.isNew && ( NEW )}

{internship.organization}

{internship.matchPercentage}%
Match
{internship.location} {internship.duration}
))}
); const renderInternshipsTab = () => (
{/* Filter Section */}
{[ { id: 'recommended', label: 'Recommended', icon: Star }, { id: 'new', label: 'New', icon: Gift }, { id: 'deadline', label: 'Ending Soon', icon: Clock }, { id: 'bookmarked', label: 'Saved', icon: Bookmark } ].map((filter) => { const IconComponent = filter.icon; return ( ); })}
{/* Internships List */}
{mockInternships.map((internship) => (
{/* Header */}

{internship.title}

{internship.isNew && ( NEW )}

{internship.organization}

{internship.description}

{internship.matchPercentage}%
Match Score
{/* Details Grid */}
{internship.location}
{internship.duration}
{internship.stipend}
{internship.deadline}
{/* Skills Required */}

Skills Required:

{internship.skills.map((skill) => ( {skill} ))}
{/* Action Buttons */}
{/* Applicant Count */}
{internship.applicants} applicants
))}
); const renderMentorsTab = () => (

Connect with Expert Mentors

Get guidance from industry professionals

{mockMentors.map((mentor) => (
{mentor.image}

{mentor.name}

{mentor.isAvailable && (
)}

{mentor.role}

{mentor.organization}

{mentor.rating}

{mentor.sessions} sessions

Expertise:

{mentor.expertise.map((skill) => ( {skill} ))}
))}
); const renderProfileTab = () => (
{/* User Profile Header */}
👤

{userProfile?.name}

Level {userStats.level} Pathfinder

{userStats.xp}
Total XP
{userStats.completedQuests}
Completed
{userStats.streak}
Streak
{/* Profile Details */}

Profile Information

{userProfile?.location}

{userProfile?.education}

{userProfile?.skills?.map((skill) => ( {skill} )) || No skills added}
{userProfile?.interests?.map((interest) => ( {interest} )) || No interests added}
{/* Achievements */}

Achievements

Quest Master

Complete 3 quests

Streak Keeper

5 day streak

Profile Pro

Complete profile

Networker

Connect 5 mentors

); return (
{/* Header */}

PragatiPath

{userStats.xp}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Render active tab content */} {activeTab === 'home' && renderHomeTab()} {activeTab === 'internships' && renderInternshipsTab()} {activeTab === 'mentors' && renderMentorsTab()} {activeTab === 'profile' && renderProfileTab()}
{/* Bottom Navigation */}
{[ { id: 'home', icon: Home, label: 'Home' }, { id: 'internships', icon: Search, label: 'Browse' }, { id: 'mentors', icon: Users, label: 'Mentors' }, { id: 'profile', icon: User, label: 'Profile' } ].map(({ id, icon: Icon, label }) => ( ))}
{/* Bottom padding to account for fixed navigation */}
); }; export default Dashboard;
